ch0351_00_shione/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been looking forward to seeing you here,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0351_00_shione/0101_0701_02_10: I always feel inspired when you’re around.
ch0351_00_shione/7101_0701_01_10:
Valerie doesn’t just look cute—her whole presence
exudes cuteness. She really is just like a doll.
ch0351_00_shione/7101_0701_02_10:
She’s the ideal Fairy-type user, which is precisely
what I strive to be.
ch0351_00_shione/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s a hard goal to reach, but I’m hopeful I’ll get
there one day.
ch0351_00_shione/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have friends and rivals,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0351_00_shione/7105_0701_02_10:
If you’ve people like that in your life, you should
be able to grow stronger.
ch0351_00_shione/7105_0701_03_10:
After all, the need to stay ahead of a rival is
great motivation!
ch0351_00_shione/1701_0701_01_10: This is a gift for you. Please accept it.
ch0351_00_shione/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps you become even cuter!
ch0351_00_shione/2501_0701_01_10:
Even if you’ve great clothes on, you’ll never bring
out their true charm if you just sit there like a doll.
ch0351_00_shione/2501_0701_02_10:
Only by smiling or frowning—by adding the
movements of a person or Pokémon who’d wear
such clothes...
ch0351_00_shione/2501_0701_03_10: can you make the outfit truly shine!
ch0351_00_shione/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’ve a favorite outfit, it’s not enough to just
act how you think matches it.
ch0351_00_shione/2501_0702_02_10:
You’ve got to imbue it with your own personality
and style!
ch0351_00_shione/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re so cute, even when you’re still sleepy.
Your face looks just like a doll’s.
ch0351_00_shione/3003_0701_01_10:
Smiles or frowns—the richer your emotions, the
brighter your clothes will shine!
ch0351_00_shione/3005_0701_01_10:
Don’t forget to take good care of your clothes.
If you’re worried, you can bring them to me.
